name: Find Your Partner
description:
[It is highly recommended to play this game in Full Screen]

Welcome to the world of shapes.  You are the blue heart shape and your partner is Red Heart Shape. But the bad red circles captured your partner. Your task is to keep hidden from the circles and find your partner. Don't forget to collect keys to open the doors.

Use A,S,D,W or the Arrow keys for movement.

This game was made in 48  hours as a game jam entry for Mini Jam 55 : STEALTH
